title: Do people even think in this game?
body:
Past 2 games i have had in ranked had 2 very weird people, the first refused to group even when they are extremely fed. and the second sees the toplaner as 1/2 and insta calls them a feeder even though they are 0/4.
can someone try explain the thought process between these people? like honestly they have to be retarded to even do such things.

replies.body: There are a **lot** of folks who play this game. You never know how experienced they are, what's going on in their life or about any number of other factors. League, let alone Ranked, is stressful to a lot of people. When it comes to particularly stressful situations people tend to not think clearly and get frustrated. Add anonymity on top of that and you've found yourself a place to vent. Sure it sucks, and I'm not condoning it, but it's probably not worth the effort reading into any instance too deep.

Please note that discussions pertaining to religion aren't allowed in this sub-board (please keep discussions related to Player Behaviour). 

Continuing to post about religion here may lead to content removal and a warning or punishment.

Political Correctness Zelotism at its finest!

Religion is behavioural.
This person being discussed is a player

Player + Behavior = Player behaviour

it fits under this category
This guy still wants to carry on....smh....THIS guy's attitude is why people rage in LoL.
I mean I'm no religio but I didn't know it was behavioural!

Why did you feel the need to bring your prejudice against religion, (and, considering this is OCE I'm confident in assuming your are referring to the Bible) into a thread about League of Legends' players' behaviours??

Obviously you are entitled to your 'opinion' on matters of faith as I am. I choose to be Christian. My CHOICE is no less valid than your choice not to believe in a Creator, and I take offence at your insinuation that somehow the negative, abusive and irrational behaviour of some LoL players is correlative to those of us who have Faith in real life in God.

Your arrogance in making such a specious correlation ironically shows you to have the kind of ignorant and judgmental attitudes of those whom the OP is referring to.
woh, the escalation. Anyway Nagakabouros is the only god you should believe in. Carry games or drown in elo-hell.
I could believe in that god any day!

I'm going to assume that you're in the lower end of MMR. You are going to see this A LOT as many players believe they should be in diamond or better and will always blame other people. It's common.  My suggestion is to only play ranked when you have a clear headspace and do not respond to toxic messages OR blame people. If they aren't grouping, try and work with the rest of your team and if worst comes to worst, just 5 man the lane said person isn't leaving.
I never respond to toxicity to team mates (let alone respond to them with chat) i'm the type of person who sits there laughing in real life about the drama these people are saying over a video game.

I think some lack the mental stability required to play certain computer games, as such should veer away from said games. A game is typically something that one engages in for amusement. If it's stressful, frustrating, gets you all salty and raging, it is no longer a game.

As for the think machine behind some players game, well to some its not a team game its a case of every summoner for themselves. Hence why some don't like to group when the time calls, rage for 'ksing', or troll/flame when a mistake it made. So i think people DO think in this game, it's just usually about themselves :P
